332,497,400,000 SHIB สัญญาณขายลงอย่างรวดเร็ว: Shiba Inu จะฟื้นตัวได้นานแค่ไหน?

332,497,400,000 SHIB Flash Bearish Signal: How Long Until Shiba Inu Recovers?

1d ago//Caroline Amosun
general
AI

Summary

TH

Shiba Inu ยังไม่สามารถฟื้นตัวจากการปรับตัวลดลงได้ เนื่องจากตัวชี้วัด on-chain และข้อมูลจาก exchange ส่งสัญญาณเชิงลงต่อเนื่อง ข้อมูลจาก Cryptoquant ระบุว่าแรงขายเพิ่มสูงขึ้นอย่างมีนัยสำคัญ โดยมี exchange netflow สูงถึง 332,497,400,000 SHIB ซึ่งบ่งชี้ว่านักเทรดกำลังโอนโทเค็นเข้า exchange เพื่อขายมากกว่าการซื้อ ความต้องการที่ต่ำทำให้ราคาตกลงไปอยู่ในระดับที่ไม่เคยเห็นมาตั้งแต่เดือนมิถุนายน 2023 ปัจจุบันอยู่ที่ราว $0.0000063 นักลงทุนยังคงรู้สึกหวาดกลัวและขายถือทิ้ง ทำให้นักวิเคราะห์เตือนว่าหากแรงขายยังคงอยู่ SHIB อาจจะต้องเพิ่มเลขศูนย์ตามหลังจุดทศนิยมได้เร็วๆ นี้

EN

Shiba Inu is struggling to recover from its recent price correction as on-chain metrics and exchange data signal continued bearish trends. Data from Cryptoquant reveals a massive spike in selling pressure, with an exchange netflow of 332,497,400,000 SHIB, indicating that traders are depositing tokens to sell rather than buying. This lack of demand has pushed the price back to levels not seen since June 2023, currently trading around $0.0000063. Investors remain fearful and are offloading holdings, leading analysts to warn that SHIB could lose another zero if the downward momentum persists.

Key Points

  • Shiba Inu exchange netflow surged to 332,497,400,000 SHIB, indicating high selling pressure and low demand.
  • The token price has dropped to $0.0000063, revisiting lows from June 2023, with a 6% decline in the last day.
  • Analysts warn that SHIB could add another zero to its price if recovery momentum fails to return.

Article

Shiba Inu has failed to recover from its recent price correction, and the on-chain metrics have failed to show any sign of a potential recovery in the price of the leading meme token. Amid the persistent price downturn, activities across all exchanges supporting Shiba Inu shows that traders are barely producing any demand for the asset. Rather, selling pressures have continued to rise. With more SHIB tokens being returned to exchanges than being bought, data from on-chain analytics platform Cryptoquant shows that the Shiba Inu exchange netflow has surged by nearly 4% over the last day, sitting at a massive 332,497,400,000 SHIB as of Thursday, Feb. 5. HOT Stories Shiba Inu returns to 2023 levels Although the ongoing market volatility had barely lasted for a week, it marks the heaviest price correction for Shiba Inu so far this year as it has sent the asset’s price to retest its multimonth lows. Following multiple days of severe price corrections, Shiba Inu is back to trading around the $0.0000063 zone, levels not seen since June 2023. This massive price drop has continued to stir doubts and fear among retail and institutional investors and they have suspended making purchases as they continue to dump off their holdings. You Might Also Like While onchain metrics are increasingly flashing bearish signals, giving investors no hope of a potential recovery soon, Shiba Inu holders are increasingly trading with caution following efforts to hedge against further losses. Amid the prolonged crypto market volatility, SHIB has continued to trade in the deep red territory and its price has declined notably by nearly 6% over the last day. Thus, the asset is trading at $0.000006325 as of the time of writing. If Shiba Inu fails to regain momentum, analysts are worried that the asset might add another zero soon.
